title: Kingston Raine and the Arena of Chaos
description: Alternate cover edition of ISBN 9780992432041Join Kingston Raine and his friends in the third book in the series.Spending an eternity in the afterlife can be pretty dull, but Limbo has a solution: an inter-realm gladiatorial battle royale designed to reward ingenuity and integrity. But really itâ€™s about cheating as much as possible and running off with the prize money. In walks Kingston Raine, ready to out-think, out-steal, and out-cheat everyone in the tournament.
author: Jackson Lear
